productDeletionInstruction: In order to continue with your product deletion, please, provide your full name (first name and last name separated by the space).
deleteProductModalDesc: It looks like you are about to delete the product, huh? Okay, but here is what you need to know, once the product is deleted, the link to this product becomes inactive and you will not be able restore it and you will have recreate the product post.
noSimilarProductsParagraph: We have not found any similar products...
logInToContact: Well... You will not be able to contact anyone unless you have an account.
